import React from 'react'; import {getCategories} from '../../Utility/Category'; import {list} from '../../Partials/style'; const AddCourse = ({item}) => { const categories = getCategories(); const saveHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const form = document.querySelector('#form'); console.log(form.images.value); const formsItem = { title: form.title.value, type: form.type.value, descript: form.descript.value, time: form.time.value, images: {'480': '/assets/uploads/2020/img-wallpaperflare.com_wallpaper (3)-480.jpg', '720': '/assets/uploads/2020/img-wallpaperflare.com_wallpaper (3)-720.jpg', '1080': '/assets/uploads/2020/img-wallpaperflare.com_wallpaper (3)-1080.jpg', 'original': '/assets/uploads/2020/img-wallpaperflare.com_wallpaper (3).jpg'}, price: form.price.value, tags: form.tags.value, }; return item(formsItem); }; return (
ایجاد دوره جدید
); }; export default AddCourse;
